title: Secure Connection Failed to https://mybenefitwallet.com/ -- Linux only. No problem in Windows FF
content:
I am unable to access https://mybenefitwallet.com/ from Firefox 86.0.1 on Fedora Linux. Same Firefox in Windows works just fine. The error I get when accessing that site is:

Secure Connection Failed

An error occurred during a connection to mybenefitwallet.com. Cannot communicate securely with peer: no common encryption algorithm(s).

Error code: SSL_ERROR_NO_CYPHER_OVERLAP
creator: mkg2

title: Firefox 86.0.1 has major problems with the newly intgrated Facebook & Instagram
content: Firefox has major problems logging into Instagram. Keep getting logged out and told to wait 24 hours to get back into my account. My account is 100% secure.
creator: NormG1
